# scm_bandwidth_allocation (Data Source)

BandwidthAllocation data source

## Example Usage

```terraform
# Look up an existing Bandwidth Allocation by name
data "scm_bandwidth_allocation" "example" {
  name = "taiwan"
}

# Output the details retrieved from the API
output "allocated_bandwidth" {
  value = data.scm_bandwidth_allocation.example.allocated_bandwidth
}

output "spn_name_list" {
  value = data.scm_bandwidth_allocation.example.spn_name_list
}

output "qos_profile" {
  value = data.scm_bandwidth_allocation.example.qos.profile
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `name` (String) name of the aggregated bandwidth region

### Read-Only

- `allocated_bandwidth` (Number) bandwidth to allocate in Mbps
- `qos` (Attributes) Qos (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--qos))
- `spn_name_list` (List of String) Spn name list
- `tfid` (String) The Terraform ID.

<a id="nestedatt--qos"></a>
### Nested Schema for `qos`

Read-Only:

- `customized` (Boolean) Customized
- `enabled` (Boolean) Enabled
- `guaranteed_ratio` (Number) Guaranteed ratio
- `profile` (String) Profile
